r.s: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP.
r.d: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP. - event-driven - full asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - millisecond timer - async MySQL - async task - async read/write file system - async dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP - SSL/TLS encrypted transmission
r.n: - Fixed udp server after the reload cycle of death BUG - Fixed http server POST request segment fault error - Added non-blocking settings for swoole_process::wait - Fixed pecl script cannot use - Fixed swoole_server->sendMessage to fail - Added swoole_websocket_server - Added swoole_server->sendto - Optimization performance for http_server - Optimization performance for swoole_client and swoole_event - Added ARM platform support
